original: 丹陽句容人，前太子孫和之妻，孫皓之母。二宮之爭後，孫和被廢，權臣孫峻弄權時，孫和遭賜死，何姬獨力撫養孫和諸子。
text: Danyang Jurong, wife of former prince Sunhe, mother of Sun Hao. After the Second Palace Controversy, Sun He was abolished. When the power minister Sun Jun used power, Sun He was gifted to death, and He Ji raised the Sun and the sons alone.
